title: Iceye to allow customers to directly task the companyâ€™s imaging satellites
summary: Iceye, a Finnish SAR satellite operator, announced the release of APIs allowing customers to directly task its satellites and access archived imagery. This capability is part of a growing trend in commercial remote sensing to provide dynamic imaging control. The company has undergone security reviews to ensure appropriate use of SAR data.
why_it_matters: The move reflects the increasing demand for real-time, customer-controlled satellite tasking in commercial remote sensing, enhancing responsiveness for applications like disaster response and maritime monitoring. However, adoption varies among U.S. government users.
